data.quote: He who has a Why can bear almost any How.
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

data.quote: That which does not kill us makes us stronger.
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

data.quote: Is life not a thousand times too short for us to bore ourselves?
data.author: Friedrich Nietzsche

data.quote: Compare yourself to who you were yesterday, not to who others are today.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: People have this capacity within them to set the world straight.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: It is more difficult to rule yourself than to rule a city.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: You can't go backward in life.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: Power is competence.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: The game is not lost - or won - until the last bell goes.
data.author: John Curtin

data.quote: Do not go gentle into that Goodnight. Rage, rage against the dying of the light.
data.author: Dylan Thomas

data.quote: Carpe Diem- Sieze the day!
data.author: Horace

data.quote: Ambition may be defined as the willingness to receive any number of hits on the nose.
data.author: Wilfred Owen

data.quote: If you are not willing to become a fool, you can't become a master.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: Face the demands of life voluntarily. Respond to a challenge, instead of bracing for catastrohpe.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: The day you stop learning is the day you start dying.
data.author: Unknown

data.quote: So, attend carefully to your posture. Quit drooping and hunching around. Speak your mind. Put your desires forward, as if you had a right to them - at least the same right as others. Walk tall and gaze forthrightly ahead. Dare to be dangerous.
data.author: Jordan Peterson

data.quote: Life always offers you a second chance. Its called tomorrow.
data.author: Dylan Thomas

data.quote: You can't cross the ocean unless you are willing to lose sight of the shore.
data.author: Japanese Proverb

data.quote: Man is the only animal that refuses to be what he is.
data.author: Albert Camus

data.quote: No matter how hard the world pushes against me, within me, there's something stronger - something better, pushing right back.
data.author: Albert Camus

data.quote: In the depth of winter, I finally learned that within me there lay an invincible summer.
data.author: Albert Camus
